scripts.minify: yarn uglifyjs src/main.js -o dist/simple-html-modal.min.js -c drop_console=true -m && cd dist && copy simple-html-modal.min.js .. && cd.. && move simple-html-modal.min.js docs/simple-html-modal.min.js
scripts.copy: yarn uglifyjs src/main.js -o dist/simple-html-modal.js -b & yarn uglifyjs src/main.js -o docs/simple-html-modal.js -b
